name: Falling Droplets
description:
One rainy day, drops falling silently out the window racing between them, some joining with others, moving, or stopping.

Control one of them and get as far as possible, the furthest you go, the higher you will be at the global highscore leaderboard.

Controls

  • Arrows to move

Credits

  • Main programmers: Rubn and RoughSkin
  • Artists: Xipock and Tostym8
  • Music and SFX: Rubn and RoughSkin
